The ideal candidate has a passion for user experience as well as meticulous attention to detail.


What Makes This Job Awesome:
- Work closely with engineers, product managers, designers, QA, and other business partners to discover and solve challenges for our customers
- Collaborate with other engineers to incrementally craft high quality products and APIs for our customers (we deploy multiples times a day)
- Have organization wide impact through your work, departmental initiatives like brown bags and recruiting, being a mentor or on-boarding buddy, etc.


Build Products That Help...
- Brokers and landlords manage the lifecycle of a commercial real estate deal - from inquiry to close
- Landlords manage relationships with their tenants (we analyze the graph of their relationships, provide insights to help close deals, expose risk, and more)
- Landlords and brokers shorten negotiation and approval times from weeks to hours when closing a deal
- Landlords analyze and understand risk in their assets
- Landlords explore the breath of their leasing data with custom reports and business intelligence software


Some Other Challenges You Might Help Solve
- How do we rethink some of our core data models and foundation to support an international product? (As we’ve expanded into Europe and beyond many of the assumptions we made for a US based market need to be reconsidered for a global user base)
- How do we reduce the time it takes to onboard new customers onto the VTS platform?
- How do we drive more usage on our mobile app?
- And many more… :)


What Makes You Awesome for the Engineering Team:
- 2+ years experience working as a full stack engineer or have a mix of those skills and willing to work full stack
- Experience delivering high-quality web applications for the consumer or enterprise
- Strongly values automated testing and implements good testing practices
- Practitioner and evangelist of agile software process and software design (experience with scrum, kanban, etc)
- Experience architecting solutions to problems in a thoughtful way - limiting number of technologies, ability to justify decisions, can articulate tradeoffs well, etc
- Experience collaborating with other engineers towards a common goal, leveraging code reviews, architecture design reviews, tdd, pairing, etc.
- Experience working closely with product managers and designers - strong customer empathy and desire to deliver a high-quality user experience
- Experience presenting technical projects and problems to non-technical folks and the ability to explain and justify the business reasons


Nice to Haves
- Experience working at a product focused company
- Experience working with our technology stack - Angular/React, Rails, PostgreSQL, Heroku, ElasticSearch
- Experience operating in larger engineering teams (20+ engineers)


What VTS Values & How We Show It:
- **Strive for Excellence** - We know your potential is unlimited. Take advantage of our executive coaches and our training and career development programs available to all employees!
- **Be**   **Customer**   **Obsessed** - We’re employee obsessed too! VTS offers competitive compensation, comprehensive health benefits (including dental and vision), pre-tax commuter benefits, and a 401(k) plan. Not to mention the fun stuff - monthly happy hours, wellness events, clubs, and team lunches!
- **Be**   **Curious** - Benefit from a culture that promotes new learning. VTS offers an education stipend to all employees!
- **Move**   **as**   **One** - We work in an open floor plan to promote cross-functional collaboration.
- **Take**   **Ownership** - Be an owner of the company you’re building with our equity packages.
- **Appreciate**   **the**   **Difference** - VTS embraces and celebrates diversity. We understand the importance of a strong work-life balance. We offer a flexible PTO policy, generous family leave program, and more!


#LI-DK1


VTS embraces diversity and equal opportunity in a serious way. We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. The more inclusive we are, the better our work will be.

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

jobs.title: Technical Client Support Associate
jobs.description:
ABOUT VTS

VTS is the fastest-growing Proptech company in the history of commercial real estate (CRE). We have transformed a $15 trillion dollar industry with our award-winning platform which is used by more than 750 of the world’s leading landlords to manage their assets, tenants, and leasing processes.  We’re continuing to expand our product offerings and are building the industry’s first and only end-to-end leasing marketplace, truva.com.  Truva will enable landlords to market their available spaces more effectively, and help tenant rep brokers and their tenants easily find and lease space online – a process that has traditionally been offline and difficult.  

It’s an exciting time to join the VTS team – we recently reached unicorn status after raising $90 million in series D funding led by our clients (believed to be the largest venture financing in the history of commercial real estate software), we recently made the Forbes Cloud 100 list of the hottest private cloud companies, and were named one of  Crain's best places to work!

Our headquarters are in NYC, but we have hubs in other major US cities, Toronto, CA and London, UK.

Learn more at vts.com or follow us on Instagram (@WeAreVTS), Twitter (@WeAreVTS), or LinkedIn.

ABOUT THE ROLE
As a Technical Support Associate, you’ll be a member of the VTS Support team working with both internal tools and external clients to solve issues related to integrations and APIs. These systems allow clients to send and receive their data to the platform in an automated fashion, which is the engine of our core platform. As a result, it is of paramount importance that this data is accurate and up-to-date.

You’ll help to ensure this by being one of the caretakers of the integration system. You’ll become an expert in how VTS receives and processes data and will be the front-line for answering questions and resolving issues for both clients externally and your colleagues internally.


WHAT YOU'LL DO
- Work directly with clients and teammates to resolve issues both technical and related to general usage of VTS
- Conduct investigations to determine how data in a client’s system reflects on the VTS product
- Ensure data cleanliness and resolve discrepancies between client systems and our product
- Analyze XML, SQL scripts and databases, JSON, Excel documents and more
- Build a strong understanding of the VTS data model, how it’s fed, its strengths and its limitations
- Thoroughly vet issues and learn when escalation to the product and engineering team is required
- Implement client customizations using SQL and integration upgrades for new and existing customers


ABOUT YOU
- You’re a people person. You know how to talk to customers; you won’t shy away from a phone call when necessary
- You’re an analytical, logical thinker - you enjoy solving complex problems and puzzles
- You’re self-directed - you're comfortable managing your own workflow, can prioritize tasks, and multi-task
- You’re a life-long learner - you thrive in an environment that gives you an ability to learn and grow your skills
- Some SQL experience OR some experience programming in any language required
- Strong written and verbal communication skills
- Experience reading XML or JSON a plus
- Experience scripting or programming a plus
- Experience with complex Excel formulas a plus


We Take Care of You!
- Competitive compensation packages, including equity
- Great medical, vision, dental, and commuter benefits
- Generous family policies
- Training and career development programs for everyone in the company
- 401K plan
- Unlimited vacation policy
- Team lunches, company happy hours, ample snacks and drinks


#LI-EC1


VTS embraces diversity and equal opportunity in a serious way. We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. The more inclusive we are, the better our work will be.

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.
